trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Edit" /> enumeration value.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "TextBox".
A value from the enumeration.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是支援的值則為支援控制項模式的物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A> method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`:
trans-unit.target: 下表說明該怎麼辦<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A>方法會傳回根據的值時`patternInterface`:

trans-unit.source: The value of `patternInterface`
The return value
A reference to the current instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer> for this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> interface.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果該值是唯讀的則為 <see langword="true" />，如果該值可修改則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of a control.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A string value of the control.
